attributes.action: I want medical cannabis patients to be allowed to grow there own medication.
attributes.additional_details: I am a medical cannabis patient and I suffer with rheumatism, and have found this medication works great for my condition. But I struggle to afford this medication each month. I also suffer with anxiety and feel at ease and comfortable when taking care of plants. So I believe this could help in many ways.
attributes.background: Allow patience to grow there own medication. Making this more accessible to everyone.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623697
